description.fr: {#CRITICAL}\_: Inflige {value:fois} fois son {%AT} aux autres adversaires adjacents<sprite name="cell_cross">.
description.en: {#CRITICAL}: Inflicts {value:fois} {fois, plural, one[time] other[times]} the companion's {%AT} on other adjacent\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> opponents.
description.es: {#CRITICAL}: Inflige {value:fois} {fois, plural, one[vez] other[veces]} su {%AT} a los demás adversarios adyacentes<sprite name="cell_cross">.
description.de: {#CRITICAL}: Verursacht bei den anderen angrenzenden\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> Gegnern das {value:fois}-fache seines {%AT} als Schaden.
description.pt: {#CRITICAL}: Inflige {value:fois} {fois, plural, one[vez] other[vezes]} seu {%AT} aos outros adversários adjacentes\_<sprite name="cell_cross">.
